resources.string: Inspection App
Inspection App

1. LH FWD FUSELAGE
 - Passenger/crew Door
 - F/O / CAPT / STBY static ports
 - AOA 1 probe
1. LH FWD FUSELAGE\n - Avionics equip.vent air inlet valve\n - Oxygen discharge indicator

2. NOSE SECTION
 - Cockpit Windshield
 - Radome and latches
 - Pilot probes
 - Antennas
 - TAT probes
2. NOSE SECTION\n - Forward avionics door\n - Ground electrical power panel

3. NOSE L/G AND DOOR
 - Doors Attachment
 - Gear Assy Structure
 - Shock Absorber Sliding Tube

3. NOSE L/G AND DOOR
 - Wheels and tires
 - Proximity Sensors
 - Taxi, TO, turn-off lights
 - Hydr. lines and elec. wires

4. RH FWD FUSELAGE
 - RH+AFT avion. doors
 - Service Door
 - Avionic vent air outlet valve

4. RH FWD FUSELAGE
 - Batteries ventilation outlet
 - F/O / CAPT / STBY static ports
 - AOA 2/3 probes
 - FWD cargo door/selector panel
5. LOWER CENTER FUSELAGE\n - Belly Fairing, access panel\n - Antennas

5. LOWER CENTER FUSELAGE
 - Waste Water Drain mast
 - Pack RAM an inlet flap
 - Anti-Collision Beacon light
 - Pack air intakes and outlets

6. RH CENTER WING
 - Landing lights
 - Wing and engine scan lights
 - Slat 1

7. ENG 2 LH SIDE
 - Pylon with fairings and fillets
 - Access panel
 - Rev. Blocker doors

7. ENG 2 LH SIDE
 - Drain mast and Pylon Drains
 - Air inlet/outlets
 - Engine air inlet: Lip Skin, Riveting
 - Engine air inlet: probe, sensors
 - Engine air inlet: Blades/spinner

8. ENG 2 RH SIDE
 - Pylon with fairings and fillets
 - Pressure-relief door
 - Exhaust: LPT blades, Nozzle

8. ENG 2 RH SIDE
 - Fan exhaust/Lining, Exit vane
 - Exhaust Thrust reverser doors
 - Access panel

9. RH WING LEADING EDGE
 - Slats (Pressure relief panels)
 - Surge Tank Air Intake
 - Static Dischargers

9. RH WING LEADING EDGE
 - Tank overpressure burst disc
 - Navigation/Strobe light
 - Wing tip

10. RH WING TRAILING EDGE
 - Static dischargers
 - Control surfaces
 - Flaps and fairings
 - Lower Wing Surface

11. RH L/G AND FUSELAGE
 - Doors Attachment
 - Gear Assy Structure
 - Shock Absorber Sliding Tube

11. RH L/G AND FUSELAGE
 - Wheels and tires
 - Proximity Sensors
 - Taxi, TO, turn-off lights
 - Hydr. lines and elec. wires
 - Brake Units

12. RH AFT FUSELAGE
 - Waste Water Drain
 - Antennas
 - Cargo Door, selector panel
 - Bulk Door

12. RH AFT FUSELAGE
 - Passenger/Crew Door
 - Toilet service access panel
 - Outflow valve
 - Radio altimeter Antenna
 - Drain mast
13. TAIL\n - Stabilizer, elevator, rudder\n - Static dischargers
13. TAIL\n - Lower fuselage structure impact\n - Wheels and tires

14. APU
 - Access doors
 - Air intake flap closed or open
 - Drains
 - Exhaust

14. APU
 - Navigation light
 - Tail Cone Strobe light
 - Static Discharger
 - THS, elevator, fin and rudder
 - Fire extinguisher red disc
All OK
Info
Plane Inspection
Carry out a general Visual Inspection as far as visible from the ground: \n- Check structure for corrosion, cracks, impact damage etc. \n- Check that there is no evident fuel, oil or hydraulic leaks.
EasyJet A319
